backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, favorites, and journal entries with access control and premium status updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level product requirements to frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for colors, theming, and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and defines all app routes wrapped in the AppLayout.
Internet Identity sign-in/out button handling session state and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header showing branding, user info, and a dropdown menu except on the splash screen.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing the header, outlet area, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/premium/PremiumG: Conditional wrapper that blocks content unless the user is signed in and premium, showing appropriate prompts.
frontend/src/data/program30Days.ts: Defines a DayProgram interface and exports a 30-day program array with daily lessons and affirmations.
frontend/src/data/textSoftlyMessages.ts: Provides categorized preset text message arrays keyed by TextCategory.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for login, logout, and identity state handling using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, premium status, favorites, and journal operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, fonts, Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode themes, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
Renders a 30‑day program with day navigation, premium gating, and dynamic content display. Redirects non‑premium users when accessing days beyond the free limit.
frontend/src/screens/JournalScreen.tsx: Provides a premium‑gated journal with entry creation, listing, and deletion. Handles authentication checks and server mutations for saving and removing entries.
frontend/src/screens/PremiumFeaturesScre: Displays premium feature information, authentication prompts, and an upgrade flow. Uses tabs to preview premium tools and allows setting a user as premium.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Shows user profile details with nickname editing, premium badge, and logout handling. Loads and updates user data via query hooks with authentication checks.
frontend/src/screens/SplashScreen.tsx: Simple splash screen with branding, decorative imagery, and a button navigating to the welcome flow.
frontend/src/screens/TextSoftlyScreen.ts: Premium‑gated message generator supporting categories, random message selection, and favorite management. Requires authentication to save or remove favorites.
frontend/src/screens/WelcomeScreen.tsx: React screen allowing users to select a relationship status, optionally sign in, and save the choice before navigating to the daily program.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with Velora’s colors, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, design requirements, features, and metadata for the Velora app MVP.
